TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXPathNavigable

Docs.summary: Provides an accessor to the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator CreateNavigator() cil managed

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the CreateNavigator method is called from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is initially positioned on the node from which the method was called. If the CreateNavigator method is called from an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> object or an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is positioned on the root of the document.
## Examples For examples of the CreateNavigator method, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> classes.
